name: orElseIf
signature: { <A2>(options: { readonly if: Predicate<ConfigError>; readonly orElse: LazyArg<Config<A2>>; }): <A>(self: Config<A>) => Config<A>; <A, A2>(self: Config<A>, options: { readonly if: Predicate<ConfigError>; readonly orElse: LazyArg<Config<A2>>; }): Config<A>; }
description:
Returns configuration which reads from this configuration, but which falls
back to the specified configuration if reading from this configuration
fails with an error satisfying the specified predicate.
documentation:
